ygData.subject: Mailing list replies

Content-Type: text/plain; charset=UTF-8
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 8bit

Hi all.

Please don’t reply to an unrelated message to start a new thread.
Those of us who use threaded mailers are likely to lose your message,
as we see it as part of another thread. Even if you change the subject
line, your mailer includes references to the other messages in the
header.

To start a new thread, create a new message to
archive-crawler@yahoogroups.com

Thanks!

best,
Erik Hetzner
;; Erik Hetzner, California Digital Library
;; gnupg key id: 1024D/01DB07E3
